full_summary:
**Canadian Government Solicitation**
# NPP AEP 2.0
----------------------

**Solicitation Overview**
Shared Services Canada is issuing a solicitation (SSC-23-00020866:T) for the supply of Aeronautical Multi-band and Value-Added Satellite Services. The solicitation calls for a single contract to be awarded to a single supplier, with a possible four one-year renewal options.

**Contract Details**

* Contract Duration: 3 years (with 4 one-year renewal options)
* Commodity: [List items in Statement of Work attached in 'attached documents']
* Delivery Location: Canada

**Undertling Territory**
This solicitation is open to bidders in Canada. Interested suppliers can register on the Shared Services Canada e-Procurement System (SSCP2-PSPC) portal to access the solicitation and respond.

**Responding Procedure**

* To participate in this solicitation, bidders must first register on the SSC-P2-PSPC portal: <https://supplier-fournisseur-sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/usr/login>
* Supplier registration is free and gives access to submit a response to this and future solicitations.

**Competitive Bidding**
Shared Services Canada invites suppliers to submit their bids for the provision of Aeronautical Multi-band and Value-Added Satellite Services. The solicitation uses a competitive open-bidding process, governed by the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and other international trade agreements.

**Selection Criteria**

The procurement process will be based on a detailed evaluation plan set forth in the solicitation, focusing on meeting the requirements outlined.
